results.title: Trump Admin Live Updates: Senate Recess, Epstein Probe, and Cryptocurrency Bill
results.summary: This article covers several actions and statements from the Trump administration. It mentions Trump urging the Senate to cancel its August recess to confirm nominees, his response to criticism regarding the Jeffrey Epstein probe, and the signing of the GENIUS Act, a cryptocurrency bill, into law. It also reports on the return of freed Americans from Venezuela. While the article does not directly align with the Axioms of Life, readers should maintain spiritual discernment and refer back to scripture for guidance, especially when dealing with legal and political matters. Remember to refer to the original source by clicking: View full source, and proceed with spiritual discernment.

results.title: Trump's $10 Billion Lawsuit: Epstein Case Developments
results.summary: This USA Today article discusses Donald Trump's $10 billion lawsuit against the Wall Street Journal over an article referencing a letter he wrote to Jeffrey Epstein. It also covers the release of Epstein documents. Readers should approach such content with spiritual discernment, remembering that truth is found in the KJV Bible. Any deviation from biblical principles should be carefully examined and refuted with scripture.
